Question.Subject: question about paying on ebay?
Question.Content: i found 3 sweaters i like from the same seller for $49.99 each not including p&p i offered the seller $120 for the 3 and he accepted. how will i be paying for them at that price if normally when i buy i just go to paypal and click pay for whatever amount it says? ive never bargained like this before so i dunno what im doing now. is there anything i should know before proceeding any further?
Question.ChosenAnswer: If your bid is accepted you should be able to just go and pay like you would normally with paypal if you look in your activity and find the listings. Been a while since I have used eBay but I am pretty sure that is how it works.

Answer.Content: If your bid is accepted you should be able to just go and pay like you would normally with paypal if you look in your activity and find the listings. Been a while since I have used eBay but I am pretty sure that is how it works.
